page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN HAUGHTON AREA
page.content: Being a rural area, large scale employers are virtually non-existant, there are , however, many small groups and these together keep a large number of people employed. Farming is the main area of employment in the area, and takes many forms. From the small family farm with father, son and per- haps the farmers wife part-time, to the large managed farms which contract outside labour and machinery. Many farms previously employing staff have been penalised by the milk quotas and cannot afford to maintain previous staff levels, so these have also become family concerns where long hours are worked to compensate for staff shortages. We have two haulage businesses locally - both family con- cerns. Apart from heavy long distance haulage, one firm also contracts to do light haulage on a local basis.
